s:service.name: GoogleService
s:service.s:description: Internal communication channel between the Google Bridge/Voice Service.

s:method.name: Sync
s:method.description: Platform message placed on the bus when Google Assistant request a sync operation. The place will be based on the place ID message header, which the Google Bridge must set.

s:return.name: userAgentId
s:return.description: User Agent ID used for posting events to Google.

s:method.name: Query
s:method.description: Platform message placed on the bus when Google Assistant requests a query operation. The place will be based on the place ID message header, which the Google Bridge must set.

s:method.name: Execute
s:method.description: Platform message placed on the bus when Google Assistant requests an execute operation. The place will be based on the place ID message header, which the Google Bridge must set.

s:parameter.name: commands
s:parameter.description: The list of commands to execute.
